section_title: National greenhouse gas (GHG) inventory data for 1990--2007 and 1990-2008
sentences: This agenda sub-item (FCCC/SBI/2009/12 and FCCC/SBI/2010/18) was first addressed by the SBI plenary on 30 November.
It was then considered in a joint contact group co-chaired by Anke Herold (Germany) and Eric Mugurusi (Tanzania).

Key issues discussed under this sub-item included whether simply to take note of the reports or to include explicit reference to the information in the reports, possibly indicating Annex I parties aggregate emissions.
On Saturday, 4 December, the SBI adopted conclusions.
